release.change: IMPROVEMENT: Flick tracking improvements.
IMPROVEMENT: Tweaked some animations for better performance around collapsing and expanding bubbles.
BUG FIX: Select element crash regression on some devices.
IMPROVEMENT: Optimized bubble dragging performance.
IMPROVEMENT: Optimized battery usage for expanded and at rest bubbles.
IMPROVEMENT: Uses built in drop downs for devices with stable WebViews.
BUG FIX: Dragging bubble sometimes showed wrong favicon.
BUG FIX: Add additional browsers to the possible fallback browser option.
BUG FIX: Fix an occasional crash when opening Link Bubble.
REMOVED: Unused GET_ACCOUNTS permission.

BUG FIX: Remove app picker dialog in most cases after opening a bubble. This may negatively interfere with default app selections for a while, but we're working on a fix for that. Thanks for your patience.
BUG FIX: Android M compatibility fixes for the fallback browser and left/right bubble pickers. We now display popular browsers which are installed on the device in the application picker.
BUG FIX: Redirected links from applications should close in a single back button press again. We're going back to the previous back button behavior for the time being.
BUG FIX: Fix for missing translations which occasionally caused crashes for non-English builds.
NEW: Long pressing on image links now gives you the option of opening the image or the link address in a new bubble.
BUG FIX: Back button handling has been refactored to fix a few cases where pressing the back button would close the bubble.
NEW: Link Bubble is now fully free! Enjoy unlimited bubbles and all pro features for free.
NEW: Themes now also apply to reading mode.
IMPROVEMENT: Offline bubble reloading will now only reload the most recent bubble. This is to reduce memory usage while also improving loading speed and stability.
NEW: Added an option to download images from the context menu after a long press. This requires us to ask for the permissions to write to external storage.
NEW: Ability to upload files via HTML file picker inputs. This requires us to ask for the permissions to read from external storage.
BUG FIX: Fixed text color for light colored theme backgrounds.
BUG FIX: Fixed previously broken functionality with various websites and image galleries.
BUG FIX: Fixed top crashers.
NEW: In bubble request desktop site option.
NEW: Bubbles loaded while not connected to the internet will now be automatically loaded once an internet connection is detected.
FIX: Reading mode sometimes not working.
FIX: Closing a tab via the hardware Back button no longer triggers a device vibration twice.
FIX: Fixed an occasional crash when focusing on drop down elements.
FIX: Fixed a crash when undoing a closed tab via the snackbar.
NEW: Add ability to color the toolbar with a website's theme color/favicon color (Settings -> Color toolbar).
NEW: Add "Domain redirects" customization, allowing you to define domains which, when loaded, will always be referred to your fallback browser (such as Chrome).
IMPROVEMENT: Update appearance for material design.
IMPROVEMENT: Use Lollipop themed Snackbar prompt. This can be dismissed also by swiping.
REMOVED: "Google Account redirect" removed in favor of new "Domain redirects" functionality.
REMOVED: "Ok Google" support. This is functionality is now available directly via the Google App (Settings -> Voice -> "Ok Google" detection -> From any screen).
NEW: Translation support for Afrikaans - South Africa, Hebrew, Indonesian, Korean, Norwegian, Slovak, Turkish, Chinese - Hong Kong SAR.
NEW: Support for select elements.
BUG FIX: Fix app when using Android System WebView v40 (on Android 5.0 or later).
BUG FIX: Stability/security fixes.
BUG FIX: Fix tab icons displaying when Link Bubble is minimized (thanks @GeneralChops90).
BUG FIX: Fix webpage scrolling becoming unresponsive after dismissing a JavaScript alert (thanks +Arpith Sharma).
BUG FIX: Page title is no longer cleared for certain URLs.
BUG FIX: Memory leak fixes. Excess battery usage issues should be largely resolved.
IMPROVEMENT: Use color on Settings dividers.
IMPROVEMENT: Optimize app boot-up time.
BUG FIX: Stability/memory leak fixes.
IMPROVEMENT: Use Android L's Up button throughout Settings.
CHANGE: Taper back the animation as Link Bubble is opened via a launcher.
CHANGE: Default zoom level is now 100%.
CHANGE: Reading Mode uses default zoom level.
CHANGE: Don't list the Google Photos app in the "Intercept links from" dialog. This app is actually the same app as Google+, and listing them both only causes confusion.
BUG FIX: Fix issue where the launcher would flash on screen for a brief moment when exiting the Settings.
BUG FIX: Stability fixes.
IMPROVEMENT: Updated Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Taiwan), Dutch, French, Russian translations. Thanks to all the volunteer translators!
BUG FIX: Dialogs display correctly when using Dark theme.
BUG FIX: Fix overly large Link Bubble icon on dialogs on lower-resolution devices.
BUG FIX: TapPath no longer appears in the "Select default app" dialog.
BUG FIX: Ensure icons on Settings screen display at a consistent size.
IMPROVEMENT: Updated Czech, German, Italian, Polish and Thai translations. Thanks to all the volunteer translators!
CHANGE: Don't include TapPath in the list of browsers/default apps.
BUG FIX: Stability fixes.
NEW: Material Design! Shadows, color and depth, oh my!
NEW: Select between light and dark themes.
NEW: Battery Save Mode (Beta).
IMPROVEMENT: Display icons on Settings (where appropriate).
CHANGE: Made the Link Bubble notification controls consistent. Touching the notification will always toggle hiding/unhiding the app. Close All is always available by expanding the notification.
BUG FIX: Notifications display dark icons on Android L and white icons on earlier Android versions.
BUG FIX: Shadow image displays underneath bubble targets.
BUG FIX: Stability fixes.
CHANGE: Increase animation speed.
BUG FIX: Fix bug where expanded bubbles would display when Link Bubble was minimized.
BUG FIX: Ensure app finishes correctly when closing tabs via a Wear device.
BUG FIX: Fix broken strings causing crashes when using Arabic or Hindi.
NEW: Text content from a link can be displayed on Android Wear devices (requires Pro). Links can also be opened/closed on your device via Wear.
NEW: Link Bubble can now be 'hidden' via the notification. When hidden, the app will still be running, just no longer visible (thus enabling background YouTube playback or similar).
IMPROVEMENT: Much smoother animation when web content slides on/off screen.
IMPROVEMENT: Restore slide-in animation when the first link begins to load.
IMPROVEMENT: Add hack to stop Pocket from displaying when you add links to it.
IMPROVEMENT: Link Bubble is minimized when links are sent to external apps when running the L Preview.
IMPROVEMENT: Cookies are now enabled in Incognito Mode, but cleared at the end of the session.
IMPROVEMENT: Changing the Incognito Mode setting forces open bubbles to be reloaded.
CHANGE: Tabs from the previous session are no longer automatically restored. A prompt is now displayed requiring confirmation to restore these tabs.
CHANGE: Periodically empty cached web data.
CHANGE: The "Intercept links from" option has unfortunately been disabled for those running the L Preview due to the Android API required for this functionality being depreciated by Google.
BUG FIX: "Intercept links from" works correctly for Android 4.4 and below.
BUG FIX: Fix rare issue where no tabs would display and pressing the device's Home button failed to close Link Bubble.
BUG FIX: Fix issue where web content sometimes failed to slide on screen.
BUG FIX: Fix issue where bubble favicon is not updated after the Pro trial has finished.
BUG FIX: Fix issue where "Unable to launch 3rd party application" toast erroneously displayed.
BUG FIX: Fix issue where Back button must be pressed after minimizing Link Bubble by dragging a bubble to the screen edge or on the Close tab target.
BUG FIX: Stability fixes.
NEW: "OK, Google" support (Requires Pro, Android 4.4 or later, must be enabled via Settings).
NEW: Free version allows for a link to be loaded from any app (previously was restricted to a single app).
NEW: Granular controls to configure which apps Link Bubble will and won't intercept links from.
NEW: When closing a tab, an Undo prompt is displayed, allowing people to quickly restore that tab (configurable via Settings).
NEW: Reading Mode (Beta), which extracts the main text from a link (Requires Pro).
IMPROVEMENT: If a link was just loaded, prevent loading that link again for a short time period. Fixes multiple links loading in the event a link is clicked twice.
IMPROVEMENT: Blacken out status and navigation bars when rendering on top of an app that uses translucent mode.
IMPROVEMENT: Enable the Up button on the Settings and History.
BUG FIX: Stability fixes.
BUG FIX: Google+ redirects work again (thanks +Ian Lake!).
NEW: Initial translations for Chinese (Taiwan), Danish, French, Hindi, Hungarian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish, Spanish (Latin America), Swedish and Turkish.
NEW: URLs can be shared directly to Link Bubble via a 3rd party app's Share button.
IMPROVEMENT: Smoother animation when dragging a bubble.
CHANGE: Clicking the Share button when reading a tab no longer automatically closes the current tab.
BUG FIX: Links that should open in a new tab when clicked no longer require a long press.
BUG FIX: Stability fix when attempting to load a 3rd party app fails.
NEW: Arabic translation.
IMPROVEMENT: Updated Czech, Chinese (Simplified), Dutch, German, Italian, Russian and Thai translations.
BUG FIX: Stability fixes.
NEW: Add a 24 hour trial of Link Bubble Pro's features for all non-Pro users.
NEW: Translation support for Czech, Chinese (Simplified), Dutch, German, Italian, Russian and Thai. More languages to follow.
NEW: Add option to change the User Agent.
NEW: Add "Close bubble" option to overflow menu.
NEW: Add "Stop" option to overflow menu when a webpage is loading.
IMPROVEMENT: If the "Vibrate on touch" system setting is disabled, the app will not trigger any vibrations.
IMPROVEMENT: Add a Close button on the upgrade/inform popup.
IMPROVEMENT: The FAQ's translation question now redirects to the community Link Bubble translation project.
BUG FIX: Many stability fixes.
BUG FIX: Many stability fixes.
NEW: Add option to set Link Bubble as the default system browser (assuming it is not already).
IMPROVEMENT: Include the title of a webpage when sharing URLs.
IMPROVEMENT: Increase time period required before "Close all" functionality kicks in when hovering over the Close bubble. Should address people unintentionally closing all their open tabs.
IMPROVEMENT: "Close all" long press text uses Sans Serif font.
IMPROVEMENT: Expand FAQ with entries about common questions such as how to close a tab quickly and why links may not be loading with Link Bubble.
IMPROVEMENT: Add shortcut to Link Bubble Beta to the FAQ.
CHANGE: Move FAQ to front page of the Settings to improve its visibility.
CHANGE: Add shortcut to view my other apps to the Settings.
BUG FIX: Fix case where YouTube embeds were sometimes not found on a page.
BUG FIX: Many stability fixes.
NEW: Clicking the version number in the settings displays the full change log.
CHANGE: Add a new 'Auto expand' checkbox to the settings. Replaces the previous (and confusing) 'Auto content display' setting.
CHANGE: By default, links no longer automatically expand when they have finished loading.

CHANGE: Free version no longer displays the notice about Link Bubble only handling links from a single app each time a link is loaded from the non-designated app. This prompt now only displays very rarely.
BUG FIX: Many stability fixes.
Fix GPS usage for pages that request location (Note: Link Bubble itself never accesses your location).
Initial release.
